channel.title: Error connecting to server?
channel.description:
have done everything like i use to do.. the port is open and everything...
idk the problem ? i log inn and says error connecting to server. ? is it to do with the client ??
but the source says online so idk ??? give me an answerr please!!!!!!

item.title: Error connecting to server?
item.dc:creator: @Gl_Then_Gf Gl Then Gf
item.description:
@Gl_Then_Gf wrote:

thats great thanks

im not great with clients.

can i as u a few more questions ?

  1. how i change the back ground of the client?

  2. how automatically i make it have the ip already in?

  3. how i reupload, so when they use it, its all new ??

i wud be so greatfull if u could help on these

thanks in advancee

Read full topic

item.title: Error connecting to server?
item.dc:creator: @aznboi594 aznboi594
item.description:
@aznboi594 wrote:

You:
you do File > Change Ip then type “localhost” then press ok
After you should be able to login.

Players (people who are being connected somewhere else other than your computer):
They must do File > Change Ip and then type “The No-Ip you registered” and then press ok
They should be able to login.

Read full topic

item.title: Error connecting to server?
item.dc:creator: @Gl_Then_Gf Gl Then Gf
item.description:
@Gl_Then_Gf wrote:

right, so say i have changed it to localhost. what about the client, it says file and change ip. ?? wht shall tht go as?

Read full topic

item.title: Error connecting to server?
item.dc:creator: @aznboi594 aznboi594
item.description:
@aznboi594 wrote:

The hoster must always use localhost and the other players must use the no-ip you have registered.

Tell the players to change the server ip to the no-ip you got
and you must change the server ip to “localhost”

Read full topic

item.title: Error connecting to server?
item.dc:creator: @Gl_Then_Gf Gl Then Gf
item.description:
@Gl_Then_Gf wrote:

well i shud i change it in the client??? but it says file and change server ip ?? wht shall i change tht to… ?

and must the hoster always have localhost on?

Read full topic

item.title: Error connecting to server?
item.dc:creator: @aznboi594 aznboi594
item.description:
@aznboi594 wrote:

You are probably logging in with your no-ip. The no-ip is only for players not you.
You must use “localhost” as a replacement of the no-ip if you are the one hosting it.

Read full topic
